title: kRadee
author: kRadee
content: The cryptocurrency market is always volatile, and predicting the future price of any coin is a difficult task. However, that hasn't stopped experts and analysts from trying to forecast the direction of Spell token's price in 2023.As of writing this "spell token price prediction" article, the token sells at $0.0006104, with a total of 103,122,979,950 SPELL in circulation, according to Coinmarketcap. SPELL's current ATH (all-time-high) is $0.07515 in 2021. The maximum supply of SPELL is 196,008,739,620 SPELL, and the total supply is 196,008,739,620.Price Forecast of Spell Token (SPELL) in 2023With the ongoing development and technological advancement of SPELL ecosystem, we could expect the Spell Token price to surge up to $0.0042853 by the end of 2023.Spell token price has the potential to reach $0.004 in 2023 and $0.03 by 2030 if the crypto traders have decided that SPELL is a good investment.
